oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Eignung des ökologischen Landbaus zur Minimierung des Nitrataustrags ins Grundwasser
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wilbois, Klaus-Peter
Scerencsits, Manfred
Hermanowski, Robert
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Air and water emissions
Soil tillage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study analyses the specific literature and examines the suitablilty of the organic croping system with special consideration of the situation in Lower Franconia to minimise the leaching of nitrate into the ground water. Furthermore, it outlines a framework for a campagne to extent organic farming in Lower Franconia.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Wilbois, Klaus-Peter; Scerencsits, Manfred and Hermanowski, Robert (2007) Eignung des ökologischen Landbaus zur Minimierung des Nitrataustrags ins Grundwasser. [Suitability of the organic cropping system to minimise the leaching of nitrate into the ground water.] FiBL Deutschland e.V., DE-Frankfurt.
